attributes.action: Urgently seek a review of Trading Standards practises which dis-allow traders from selling customers goods in the Imperial measures that they require.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: Now that the EU Commission has given up its struggle to force the British to exclusively adopt the dis-liked metric system (which even Napoleon Bonaparte didn't want!) it is time that the law was reviewed retrospectively and that this should lead to those those traders, persecuted for their desire to sell to the public in the Imperial units of its choice, being given an unequivocal pardon.
